title: Daily Reporting Workflow Specification
description: The standard process for summarizing session logs and archiving them in the Heartwood.

workflow.name: Daily Reporting
steps: Identify raw .txt logs in dynamic/stream/ (formerly .chat/unclean/ - DEPRECATED).
Generate structured JSON summaries via dspy_chat_summarizer.
Consolidate into Daily Summary Markdown via dspy_daily_summary_generator.
